back1.name: Phoenix 2
back1.text: Welcome back, cutie! How was your walk?

back2.name: Phoenix 2
back2.text: Welcome home, sweetheart! Did you find the Bellgates?

back3.name: Phoenix 2
back3.text: Home sweet home. Did you see the sad mare with the blue box? …or was it a colt?

back4.name: Phoenix 2
back4.text: Welcome to the coziest vault in the world.

back5.name: Phoenix 2
back5.text: Oh, it's you! Did you bring anything good?

back6.name: Phoenix 2
back6.text: Congratulations on your successful survival in the desert!

resurrection1.name: Phoenix 2
resurrection1.text: Thank you for using experimental resurrection sytem called 'Phoenix 2'!

resurrection2.name: Phoenix 2
resurrection2.text: I hope, you won't die again.

cloneRoom1.name: Phoenix 2
cloneRoom1.text: Warning! There are not enough materials to create a new batch of clones.

cloneRoom2.name: Phoenix 2
cloneRoom2.text: Honey, these are your last clones.

cloneRoom3.name: Phoenix 2
cloneRoom3.text: If they all die, you're dead for good!

lastClone.name: Phoenix 2
lastClone.text: Honey, this is your last clone! If you die, you die forever!

dieFromFly.name: Phoenix 2
dieFromFly.text: Next time, try to fly more carefully.

dieFromRadiation.name: Phoenix 2
dieFromRadiation.text: Dear, don't forget that the radiation levels are still frighteningly high!

dieOften.name: Phoenix 2
dieOften.text: Am I such bad company that you kill yourself so often?

fuel.name: Phoenix 2
fuel.text: Warning! Critical depletion of fuel elements has been detected.

kitchen.name: Phoenix 2
kitchen.text: Warning! The forage supply is running low. Drinking filter is defective.

wc.name: Phoenix 2
wc.text: Warning! A clog in the water pipe, has been detected.

radiation1.name: Phoenix 2
radiation1.text: Warning! Deadly levels of radiation have been detected on the surface.
